S.FORM: Mongolia Itini i 46 00 N, 105 00 E, noAsiya ko Mongolia. Polong no sekalay i 1,564,116 sq km "saka 19 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,553,556 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 10,560 sq km " Polong i 3,031,330 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 73 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 7 , malo no roma to a sera 20 . siyoto O Ulaanbaatar ko Siyoto. Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakapito 11 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, patirengan a romi'ad i 2009 a miheca saka 6 folad saka 18 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
